translations: 迷惑龙；雷龙（恐龙的一种，生活于约140百萬年前的侏罗纪）

sentences.sentence: Apatosaurus could live in lakes or swamps, but mostly on dry land.
sentences.translation: 迷惑龙能生活在湖里或沼泽地中，但大部分都住在陆地上。

sentences.sentence: Taxonomists renamed it Apatosaurus in 1903 when it was discovered that two different names referred to the same dinosaur.
sentences.translation: 1903年，当发现有两个不同的名字指代这一恐龙时，分类学家们将它重新命名为 Apatosaurus。

sentences.sentence: Even at a mere 18 tonnes, Apatosaurus would still be an awesome sight.
sentences.translation: 即使只有区区18吨重，虚幻龙仍然会令人叹为观止。
